source.query: SELECT AL1."cdorder", AL1."cddeb", AL1."opm-30", AL3."cdorg-afl", AL4."naamorg", AL3."cdverzendwijze", AL6."cdprodukt", AL6."aantal", AL3."id-cdads-afl", AL7."licenseplate" FROM "PUB"."va-210" AL1, "PUB"."lb-192" AL2, "PUB"."la-611" AL5, "PUB"."lb-186" AL6, "PUB"."lk-100" AL7, "PUB"."la-610" AL3 LEFT OUTER JOIN "PUB"."ba-001" AL4 ON (AL3."cdorg-afl"=AL4."cdorg") WHERE (AL2."cdadmin"=AL1."cdadmin" AND AL1."cdorder"=AL2."cdorder" AND AL3."cdadmin"=AL5."cdadmin" AND AL5."cdzending"=AL3."cdzending" AND AL5."cdadmin"=AL6."cdadmin" AND AL6."cdadmin"=AL2."cdadmin" AND AL2."nrpakbon"=AL6."nrpakbon" AND AL5."nrpakbon"=AL6."nrpakbon" AND AL2."rglpakbon"=AL6."rglpakbon" AND AL3."cdadmin"=AL7."cdadmin" AND AL3."cdzending"=AL7."nrmutatie")  AND ((AL1."cddeb"='203302' AND AL1."cdadmin"='10' AND AL3."datum-verz" >= { fn CURDATE()} - 2 AND AL7."cdstatus"='LABL'))
